p: Additionally, we found a dose-dependent anthelmintic property for this plant extract in the in vitro anthelmintic assay against adult earthworm (Table 6). The paralysis time at different concentrations of 10, 20, 30, 40 and 50 mg/ml was 52.6, 43.4, 34.4, 22.2, 16.6 min, respectively whereas death time at the same concentrations was 77.4, 62, 48.2, 31.4, 27.6 min, respectively.
